summary: An email from a Facilities Management Specialist at the Northeast Regional Office scheduling TDY (Temporary Duty) assignments for individuals in New York, specifically for camera-related work, during August and September 2019. The document is marked as potentially containing sensitive information.

persons.context: The sender of the email, scheduling TDY assignments for individuals to work on cameras in New York.

keyFacts: The email schedules TDY (Temporary Duty) assignments for individuals to work on cameras in New York during August and September 2019.
The sender is a Facilities Management Specialist at the Northeast Regional Office.
The document is marked as potentially containing sensitive information and is intended for official use.
Two additional individuals were being contacted for potential scheduling in the September 3-21 timeframe.
The email subject and content suggest operational planning for surveillance or security camera work in New York.
